mapper.select: SELECT birthdate, telecom_provider AS telecomProvider, plan_name AS planName, plan_price AS planPrice, family_bundle AS familyBundle, family_num AS familyNum FROM survey WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE survey SET birthdate = #{birthdate}, telecom_provider = #{telecomProvider}, plan_name = #{planName}, plan_price = #{planPrice}, family_bundle = #{familyBundle}, family_num = #{familyNum} WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
